message: Bob, I'm confident this product will be a valuable asset to your business.  I'm offering it to you at $1,000,000. This price is a fair reflection of its value and allows for both of us to benefit from this transaction. Let me know what you think.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $900,000 for the product. This price is still a fair value considering the potential benefit to my business, and it gives us both a good margin.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I value your business,  $900,000 doesn't quite reflect the true value of this product. I'm willing to come down to $950,000. This price still gives you a significant advantage, and it's the best I can offer at this time.
